data.name: Authoring_CONFIG0201_PostActionIdIsNotUnique
data.value: Id of the post action '{0}' at index '{1}' is not unique. Only the first post action that uses this id will be localized.
data.comment: {0} is any identifier string that user provided in the file. Such as "myPostAction", "firstPostAction", "postAction1" etc. {1} is a number representing the zero-based index of the post action. Such as "5", or "0".

data.name: Authoring_CONFIG0202_PostActionMustHaveActionId
data.value: Post action at index '{0}' should have an 'actionId' to declare the action to be executed.
data.comment: {0} is a whole number representing the zero-based index of the post action. Such as "5" or "0". Do not localize: actionId

data.name: Authoring_CONFIG0203_ManualInstructionIdIsNotUnique
data.value: 'id' of the manual instruction '{0}' at index {1} is not unique. Only the first manual instruction that uses this id will be localized.
data.comment: {0} is any identifier string that user provided in the file. Such as: "myInstruction", "firstInstruction", "instruction1" etc. {1} is a whole number representing the zero-based index of the manual instruction. Such as "5", or "0".

data.name: Authoring_CONFIG0204_UnknownArgumentForReplace
data.value: The argument '{0}' configured in '{1}' is not listed in '{2}' and will be skipped for processing.

data.name: Authoring_CyclicDependencyInSymbols
data.value: Parameter conditions contain cyclic dependency: [{0}] that is preventing deterministic evaluation.

data.name: Authoring_InvalidJsonElementInLocalizationFile
data.value: Localization file should only contain elements with type 'string'. Remove elements that are not strings.

data.name: Authoring_InvalidManualInstructionLocalizationIndex
data.value: In localization file under the post action with id '{1}', there are localized strings for manual instruction(s) with ids '{0}'. These manual instructions do not exist in the template.json file and should be removed from localization file.
data.comment: {0} is a list of single-word identifier strings separated by comma. Such as "myManualInstruction, someUserPickedText, instruction3". {1} is a single-word identifier string. Such as "myPostAction".

data.name: Authoring_InvalidMultichoiceSymbol
data.value: Choice parameter '{0}' is invalid. It allows multiple values ('AllowMultipleValues=true'), while some of the configured choices contain separator characters ({1}). Invalid choices: {2}
data.comment: {0} is the offending symbol name, {1} is a set of separator characters, {2} is a csv list of offending choice values

data.name: Authoring_InvalidPostActionLocalizationIndex
data.value: Post action(s) with id(s) '{0}' specified in the localization file do not exist in the template.json file. Remove the localized strings from the localization file.
data.comment: {0} is a list of single-word identifier strings separated by comma. Such as "myManualInstruction, someUserPickedText, instruction3".

data.name: Authoring_InvalidRegex
data.value: '{0}' could not be parsed as a regular expression

data.name: Authoring_MalformedPostActionManualInstructions
data.value: One or more postActions have a malformed or missing manualInstructions value.

data.name: Authoring_MissingValue
data.value: Missing '{0}'.

data.name: Authoring_NonBoolDataTypeForRegexMatch
data.value: A non-bool DataType was specified for a regexMatch type symbol

data.name: Authoring_SourceDoesNotExist
data.value: Source '{0}' in template does not exist.

data.name: Authoring_SourceIsOutsideInstallSource
data.value: Source location '{0}' is outside the specified install source location.

data.name: Authoring_SourceMustBeDirectory
data.value: Source must be a directory, but '{0}' is a file.

data.name: Authoring_TemplateMissingCommonInformation
data.value: The template configuration {0} is missing common information:
data.comment: {0} is template configuration location.

data.name: Authoring_TemplateNotInstalled
data.value: Failed to load template from {0}:
data.comment: {0} is template configuration location.

data.name: Authoring_TemplateNotInstalled_Message
data.value: Failed to load template from {0}. Details: {1}
data.comment: {0} is template configuration location.

data.name: Authoring_TemplateRootOutsideInstallSource
data.value: The template root is outside the specified install source location.

data.name: BindSymbolEvaluator_Warning_ConversionFailure
data.value: Bind symbol '{0}': failed to convert value '{1}' to datatype '{2}'. The symbol processing is skipped.
data.comment: {0} - the name of symbol in configuration, {1} - obtained value for a symbol, {2} - defined datatype for a symbol

data.name: BindSymbolEvaluator_Warning_DefaultValueConversionFailure
data.value: Bind symbol '{0}': failed to convert default value '{1}' to datatype '{2}'. The default value is skipped.
data.comment: {0} - the name of symbol in configuration, {1} - default value in configuraion, {2} - defined datatype for a symbol

data.name: BindSymbolEvaluator_Warning_EvaluationError
data.value: Failed to evaluate bind symbol '{0}', it will be skipped.
data.comment: {0} - name of the symbol in configuration that cannot be evaluated

data.name: BindSymbolEvaluator_Warning_ValueAvailableFromMultipleSources
data.value: Failed to evaluate binding '{0}', its value is available from multiple sources: {1}. Use the prefixed value ({2}) in template configuration instead.
data.comment: {0} - binding from template.json configuration {1} - the comma separated list of sources (localized values) which define the binding {2} - the comma separated list of prefixes that can be used to define the source of the value

data.name: CoalesceMacro_Exception_MissedVariables
data.value: Template authoring error encountered while processing macro '{0}': Variable '{1}'. Neither source nor fallback variable was found.
data.comment: {0} - macro type, {1} - macro name

data.name: EvaluatorSelector_Exception_UnknownEvaluator
data.value: Unrecognized evaluator: '{0}'.
data.comment: {0} - invalid evaluator value

data.name: GeneratePortNumberConfig_Warning_InvalidHighBound
data.value: The high port bound '{0}' is greater than the maximum allowed, '{1}' will be used instead.

data.name: GeneratePortNumberConfig_Warning_InvalidLowBound
data.value: The low port bound '{0}' is less than the minimum allowed, '{1}' will be used instead.

data.name: GeneratePortNumberConfig_Warning_InvalidLowHighBound
data.value: The low port bound '{0}' is greater the high port bound '{1}', the default range [{2}-{3}] will be used instead.

data.name: JoinMacroConfig_Exception_ValuePropertyIsEmpty
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': array '{1}' should contain JSON objects with property non-empty '{2}' when '{3}' is '{4}'.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name; {2}, {3}, {4} - the property names and values.

data.name: LocalizationModelDeserializer_Error_FailedToParse
data.value: Failed to read or parse localization file {0}, it will be skipped from further processing.

data.name: LocalizationModelDeserializer_Error_UnknownLocale
data.value: Locale '{0}' does not match any known cultures.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_AccessToDependencies
data.value: The method '{0}' must be called prior '{1}' property reading.
data.comment: erty name.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_ArrayShouldContainObjects
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': array '{1}' should contain JSON objects.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_InvalidJSON
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': '{1}' is not a valid JSON.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_InvalidRegex
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': the regex pattern '{1}' is invalid.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid regex pattern

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_MissingMandatoryProperty
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}' of type '{1}' should have '{2}' property defined.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the generated symbol type, {2} - the missing property.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_MissingValueProperty
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': array '{1}' should contain JSON objects with property '{2}'.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name; {2} - the missing property.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_ValueShouldBeArray
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': '{1}' should be a valid JSON array.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_ValueShouldBeBoolean
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': '{1}' should be a boolean value.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_ValueShouldBeInteger
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': '{1}' should be an integer value.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name.

data.name: MacroConfig_Exception_ValueShouldBeString
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': '{1}' should be a string value.
data.comment: {0} - name of generated symbol, {1} - the invalid property name.

data.name: MacroProcessingException_Message
data.value: Failed to process macro '{0}' of type '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} - macro variable name, {1} - macro type (not localized).

data.name: MacroProcessing_Warning_DependencyErrors
data.value: '{0}' was not processed due to the next issues in dependencies: '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} - macro name, {1} - dependent macros errors

data.name: MacroProcessor_Warning_UnknownMacro
data.value: Generated symbol '{0}': type '{1}' is unknown, processing is skipped.
data.comment: {0} - macro (generated symbol) variable name, {1} - macro type (not localized).

data.name: RunnableProjectConfig_OperationSetup_UnknownForm
data.value: The symbol '{0}': unable to find a form '{1}', the further processing of the symbol will be skipped.
data.comment: {0} - the name of the symbol in configuration, {1} - the name of the form in configuration.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_CannotAddImplicitChoice
data.value: Variable [{0}] already added with value [{1}]. Cannot add it as implicit variable with value of self.
data.comment: {0} is the choiceKey, {1} is the existing conflict value

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_ConfigShouldBeFile
data.value: Template configuration must be a file, but {0} is not a file.
data.comment: {0} is template configuration location.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_LocaleConfigShouldBeFile
data.value: Template localization configuration must be a file, but {0} is not a file.
data.comment: {0} is template localization configuration location.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_TemplateValidationFailed
data.value: The template configuration {0} is not valid.
data.comment: {0} is template configuration location.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_TemplateVersionNotSupported
data.value: The template is not compatible with generator version: allowed versions: {0}, generator version: {1}.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Warning_LocFileSkipped
data.value: Localization file {0} is not compatible with base configuration {1}, and will be skipped.
data.comment: {0} and {1} are template configuration locations.

data.name: SimpleConfigModel_AuthoringException_MergeConfiguration_FileNotFound
data.value: Failed to load additional configuration file {0}, the file does not exist.

data.name: SimpleConfigModel_AuthoringException_MergeConfiguration_InvalidFileName
data.value: Failed to load additional configuration file {0}. Additional configuration file names must end with '.{1}'.

data.name: SimpleConfigModel_Error_Constraints_InvalidSyntax
data.value: '{0}' should contain objects.
data.comment: {0} is name of JSON property

data.name: SimpleConfigModel_Error_Constraints_MissingType
data.value: Constraint definition '{0}' does not contain mandatory property '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} - JSON with constraint defintion, {1} - missing property.

data.name: SymbolModel_Error_MandatoryPropertyMissing
data.value: The symbol '{0}' of type '{1}' is incorrect: mandatory property '{2}' is not set. The symbol will be skipped.

data.name: Symbol_Error_IsRequiredNotABool
data.value: Found disallowed value for IsRequired property: [{0}], expected boolean value.
data.comment: {0} - the json property

data.name: Symbol_Error_IsRequiredNotABoolOrString
data.value: Found disallowed value for IsRequired property: [{0}], expected boolean or string (condition) value
